CHAT_NOT_FOUND: 📛Chat hasn't been set up!For initialization send /initialize_chat
BOT_IS_NOT_ADMIN: 🚫I haven't admin rights for deleting anonimous messages
BOT_IN_CHAT_ENABLED: ❕Now in this chat anonymous channels can't send messages
BOT_IN_CHAT_DISABLED: ❕Now in this chat anonymous channels can send messages
HELP: Avaliable commands: - /help - get bot commands - /initialize_chat - set up chat - /disable_chat - disable chat protecting - /enable_chat - enable chat protecting - /set_lang {lang} - set other lang in bot
LANG_NOT_FOUND: 🔍❌Language not found in my list. The language is specified incorrectly or does not exist in my list
